channel.title: Mini Game Creation
channel.description:
Hey all i'm think of making a Defender mini game! it will have monsters what you have to kill and then once you kill them you get teleported to the guy then you trade him (also when you get telported you get Coins to buy 1 of the Defenders.. NO wait... lol just make them cost nothing and then you trade a guy and click it!! w00t this is fun!!! Ok if anyone wants to make THIS and many more mini games Post here
[b]use this application!!![/b] [code] Name: Mini game you want: How much do you know java? how much can you be on:[/code]
Mini Games Done: - - -
Pm me the code when you are done! I'm making a server and i give you credits and admin also G mod on the forums!!
NOTE: Mini Games must be good. Also You will team up with people to make a mini game, I group people up not your friend!

item.title: Mini Game Creation
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Name: X-J-K-X
Mini game you want: Dont mind which… Just here to help.
How much do you know java: Hmm quite alot… Just get stuck on the most simple problems :)… Other than that, you could say im alright
how much can you be on: Lots… (Depending on what time i get up) which is like 7:00am (GMT). Weekends almost, all day… Weekdays, 3:10pm - 10:30pm…

My opinion: You dont have to accept if you dont wanna … Obv you know this, just letting you know i wont be offended

Read full topic
